code: var useTripPlanningLocalStorage=function useTripPlanningLocalStorage(){var saveTripType=function saveTripType(type){localStorage.setItem('tripType',type);};var saveStartDate=function saveStartDate(date){localStorage.setItem('tripStartDate',date);};var saveEndDate=function saveEndDate(date){localStorage.setItem('tripEndDate',date);};var clearTripDates=function clearTripDates(){localStorage.setItem('tripStartDate',null);localStorage.setItem('tripEndDate',null);};var updateTripData=function updateTripData(tripStartDate,tripEndDate){if(tripStartDate){localStorage.setItem('tripStartDate',tripStartDate);}if(tripEndDate){localStorage.setItem('tripEndDate',tripEndDate);}};var getTripData=function getTripData(){var tripType=localStorage.getItem('tripType');var startDate=localStorage.getItem('tripStartDate');var endDate=localStorage.getItem('tripEndDate');return{tripType:tripType,startDate:startDate,endDate:endDate};};return[saveTripType,saveStartDate,saveEndDate,updateTripData,clearTripDates,getTripData];};export default useTripPlanningLocalStorage;
